Name: Darkest Wave
About the game: In the future retro of 3180, The government has created a program of self aware mechanized creatures and they have gone rogue. The story begins as Max Titan gets the call that he has to bail the world out yet again, Max pilots his custom Fighter car the X-50 to destroy the sentient bosses of this growing army of mechanized animals and insects. Fly with Max through 5 levels of explosive color and sound. Full 60 fps shoot-em up madness, enemy waves designed on beats per minute! Darkest Wave OST included courtesy of Shaft Records. Steam Trading Cards coming soon!
